content:
Find answers to common questions about our services, programs, and approach to health and wellness.

What kind of services do you offer?

We offer a range of services including personalized health consultations, specialized detox and wellness programs, health awareness courses, and more. Please visit our Services page for detailed information.

How can I book a consultation?

You can book a consultation by visiting our Personalized Health Consultation page and following the registration instructions, or by contacting us directly.

Are your programs available online?

Yes, many of our courses and programs, such as the Health Awareness Course and Dhanwantari Yog Training, are available in both online and offline formats. Please check the specific service page for detail. yes
